definition: twice a month, occurring twice a month, a periodical that is published twice each month (or 24 issues per year)
details:
adverb
- twice a month
= example: twice a month
= synonyms: bimonthly
adjective
- occurring twice a month
= example: occurring twice a month
= synonyms: bimonthly
noun
- a periodical that is published twice each month (or 24 issues per year)
